text: Dan Hicks (July 19, 1951 - June 30, 2020) was an American actor. Hicks was best known for starring roles in Evil Dead II, Darkman and Intruder. He starred in many movies directed by Sam Raimi such as Spider-Man 2 and Oz the Great and Powerful. Hicks was born in Pontiac, Michigan. On June 6, 2020, he was diagnosed with stage-4 cancer.‘Evil Dead 2’ Star Danny Hicks Announces Stage 4 Cancer Diagnosis He died from the disease a few weeks later on June 30, 2020 in California, aged 68.‘Evil Dead II’ and ‘Intruder’ Star Danny Hicks Has Passed Away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:People from Pontiac, Michigan
title: Dan Hicks (actor)
